item.title: California School Dashboards Part 3
item.description: This is part three of a three part series where I work with California School Dashboard data by cleaning, visualizaing, and exploring through modeling. You can read the first part of this series, which shows one way to clean and prepare the data, and the second part of the series, which shows a way to visualize the…

item.title: Turning Dataset Codes to Words With R

item.title: Public School Data is Great, But You Have to Clean It First

item.title: Liverpool FC's Managers
item.description: Anfield in Liverpool is one of the legendary stadiums of English football. Fortress Anfield has been the home to many historic games, including Liverpool’s 4-3 win against Newcastle in 1996 and my personal favorite, Liverpool’s 3-1 win against Olympiacos to go through to the Champions League’s last…
